漘字的基本解释

漘
chún
水边：“坎坎伐轮兮，置之河之漘兮。”
临水的山崖。

漘字的汉语字典释义

[①]［chún］
［《廣韻》食倫切，平諄，船。］
亦作“浱1”。亦作“滣1”。
(1)水边。
(2)临水的山崖。

漘字的康熙字典解释

【巳集上】【水字部】　漘； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页645第28
【廣韻】食倫切【集韻】【韻會】船倫切，?音唇。【說文】水厓也。【詩·王風】在河之漘。【傳】漘，水隒也。【疏】引爾雅云：夷上洒下不漘。郭云：涯上平坦而下水深爲漘。【集韻】或省作浱。

考證：〔【詩·王風】在河之漘。【疏】引爾雅云，夷上灑下曰漘。〕　謹照原文灑下改洒下。曰漘改不漘。
漘字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
漘字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
shore
chún
Waterside: "Kumps and fells round, set the river like a river."
The cliffs near the water.
shore
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［chún］
["Guangyun" Food Lunqie, flat and honest, boat. ]
Also known as "Xun 1". Also known as "Feng 1".
(1) Waterside.
(2) The cliffs near the water.
shore
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Siji 1] [Water Word Department] 　漘; Kangxi strokes: 15; Page number: page 645 28
[Guang Yun] Shi Lun cut [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] Boat Lun cut, sound lips. [Said the text] Shuiya also. 【Poetry·Wang Feng】in Hezhizhu. [Biography] Zhuo, water puma also. 【Sparse】Yin Er Yayun: Sprinkle on the barbarian but not on the bottom. Guo Yun: The cliff is flat and the water is deep. [Jiyun] or province for the 浱. Textual research: [[Poetry·Wang Feng] in Hezhizhu. 【Sparse】Introduce Er Yayun, and say Jiao on the barbarian. 〕 　 I would like to sprinkle it according to the original text. Said that the change should not be changed.
